message:
Dear {{ emp }},

This is to inform you that your signature has been used in the {{letter}} for {{name}} under the company {{ company }}.

If this was expected, no further action is required.

If you were not aware of this activity, please contact the system administrator immediately.

Best Regards,
{{ frappe.session.user }}
ERP System Notification
name: Signature Used
subject: Your Signature Was Used in Document Approval
